long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QA Assistant for PT QA needs

Features:
1. Simplified comment paste tool for JIRA
 - press RMB over a text input field and choose what type of comment to paste 
2. Ability to create device pool: add/remove devices that will be pasted in comment details
3. Form reader/writer to speed up daily routine 
 - scan your page
 - modify scan results
 - create different templates 
 - paste data on page

Designed for internal company(PT) usage

Link to github project: https://github.com/vladimir-vladimirovich/QA_Assistant-Chrome_Extension
